actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to authorize the States to carry out certain functions of the Secretary of the Army and the Chief of Engineers on intrastate waters.

summary.text: Authorizes the States to perform certain functions delegated to the Secretary of the Army and the Chief of Engineers with respect to public works and dredging projects on intrastate waters. Establishes proceedings designed to insure that compliance with applicable program requirements be submitted by States for the approval of the Secretary. Authorizes the Secretary to withdraw approval of State programs which are improperly administered.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the States to carry out certain functions of the Secretary of the Army and the Chief of Engineers on intrastate waters.
